attributes.action: take all necessary steps to ensure that Oaklands Pool in Southampton remains open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oaklands Community Pool in Southampton is under threat from closure.

Up and down the country swimming facilities are under threat. 

If we want to compete at the 2012 Olympics we need good, local, swimming facilities.

We call upon the Prime Minister to write to Southampton City Council to express the communities desire that the pool remains open.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
